title: Port interface of store base class from Caffe2
body_html:
The file store implementation is new and based on the file initialization method (which uses a single file and file locking) and the interface of the Caffe2 store handler.

The single file and locking approach is identical to what the file init method in THD does, but applied to general set/get instead of only to share IP addresses and ports. The single file and locking approach is different from what Caffe2 does, but I like it better because there is only a single file to clean up.

See https://gavv.github.io/blog/file-locks/ for a comprehensive overview of file locking methods and the reason I went with flock(2) here.

See #7434.
